title: Confronting Zika and other Viruses, with Bill Nye and Laurie Garrett – StarTalk All-Stars
description: If you want to sleep tonight, skip this episode of StarTalk All-Stars. Bill Nye, Chuck Nice and virus expert Laurie Garrett examine how we’re fighting Zika, Dengue, West Nile, HIV and other viruses – and why the battle may not be going our way.
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
